Title: 171: Deep dive into R Programming & R Studio
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with the Director of Solutions Engineering for RStudio, Nathan Stephens. You will hear about the analytic admin concept and the idea behind this role, know why the R language is the most inclusive programming language for other languages, and learn about analytics infrastructure & how this can be used in the data lab and the production environment.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/171
